text:
[Verse]
Feel the drops fall down
Splashing on the ground
Feet begin to move
Can't stop this groove

[Verse 2]
Clouds up in the sky
We don't question why
Turn the gray to bright
Dance into the night

[Chorus]
Let the raindrops sing
We just do our thing
Twirl around and spin
Feel it on our skin

[Verse 3]
Puddles all around
Jump without a sound
Laughing through the storm
Hearts forever warm

[Verse 4]
Listen to the beat
Underneath our feet
Nature's sweet refrain
Dancing in the rain

[Bridge]
No need to pretend
Storm will never end
Find your joy within
Life’s a whirlwind
title: Dance in the Rain
